welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mineola, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that Mineola has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves international flights and is operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights and is operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest and busiest at JFK, serving both international and domestic flights and is operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights and is operated by JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights and is operated by British Airways, Alaska Airlines, and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic and international flights and is operated by American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal where all domestic and international flights operate.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used by United Airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device, per day. Upgrade options available for longer access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
